about_the_game:
Check this out!





An addicting clicker game that will put you in the shoes of a novice streamer! Condemn everything, gain subscribers !
In this game you have to start your streaming career from scratch, you will not have subscribers to buy ads or equipment, you will have to earn everything with your perseverance and hard work!

Distinctive features:
Work your way from a novice streamer with zero subscribers to a worldwide recognized star
Quit your boring job and make your living by streaming alone
Experience the wonders of engineering by installing a chromakey.
Upgrade your stream by buying improvements, do everything for your favorite subscribers!
Change your look to always stay in trend!

name: Stream Madness

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB+
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 3 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB+
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: An addicting clicker game that will put you in the shoes of a novice streamer! Condemn everything, gain subscribers and collect donations!
